It also provides new energy power generation solutions, including pre-planning, survey, and design, as well as EPC solutions; smart transportation solutions comprising off-site overweight and oversize enforcement, and cloud based overweight and oversized vehicle detecting systems, as well as bridge health monitoring vehicle axle load monitoring subsystem; and traffic survey system. In addition, the company offers electricity sale solutions, including investment and financing, consulting, network construction, professional operation, information technology, and value-added services; water resources and hydropower ICT solutions; mountain flood disaster monitoring and early warning system; unmanned aerial vehicle emergency command and control system; and energy saving and environmental protection solutions. Further, it provides smart conference rooms, online education and training systems, and engineering 3D visualization application solutions; and operates Forever, a cloud service platform that provides informatization products and SaaS services for various industries. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

300379.SZ.summary: Beijing Tongtech Co., Ltd. provides security solutions in China. It offers communications security, 5G innovation applications, and industrial Internet security products and solutions to help users achieve business innovation, security management, and data sharing and value mining. The company provides middleware products and solutions; and information security, network security, data security, business security, and other products; and support services. Its products and solutions are used in various industries, such as telecommunications, finance, government, energy, transportation and other industries. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

300380.SZ.summary: Shanghai Amarsoft Information & Technology Co.,Ltd provides IT solutions to financial and non-financial customers in China. It offers software products, such as credit management, risk management, trust management, P2P online loan, and supply chain financing systems, as well as business consulting, system development and implementation, data services, and other services. In addition, the company provides cloud platform. Shanghai Amarsoft Information & Technology Co.,Ltd is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

300399.SZ.long_name: Beijing Tianli Mobile Service Integration, Inc.
300399.SZ.summary: Beijing Tianli Mobile Service Integration, Inc. provides integrated solutions for mobile information systems in China. The company offers mobile information application solutions, including customized development, business integration, operational support, and customer relationship management services, as well as SMS, MMS application, and cloud platform-based mobile information services to large and medium-sized group customers. It also provides Internet finance and insurance services; and software custom development, terminal equipment, operation support, and comprehensive consulting services. Beijing Tianli Mobile Service Integration, Inc. was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

300520.SZ.summary: GuoChuang Software Co.,Ltd operates as a software company in China and internationally. It offers software research and development services, including offshore software development, software application development, system integration, and maintenance service for various industries, such as tobacco, telecom, electric power, financing, healthcare, manufacturing, e-commerce, education, retail, etc., as well as governments. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Hefei, China.

300571.SZ.long_name: Hangzhou Anysoft Information Technology Co., Ltd.
300571.SZ.summary: Hangzhou Anysoft Information Technology Co., Ltd. aggregates and provides text and audio-visual content in China. The company provides users with digital reading through PC, smart phone, tablet, e-reader, car, wearable device, and other reading carriers. Its services include online literature, publishing books, magazines, newspapers, radio broadcasts, music and art talks, education and training lectures, etc. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

300588.SZ.long_name: Xinjiang Sailing Information Technology Co., Ltd.
300588.SZ.summary: Xinjiang Sailing Information Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the software and information technology services business in China. It offers smart security and safe city solutions; information security solutions, such as business security and public security audit systems; and customs special supervision area informatization solutions. The company also provides training, and ITO and BPO services. It serves public security, finance, insurance, transportation, government, and other industries, as well as enterprises. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Urumqi, China.

300609.SZ.summary: Winner Technology Co., Inc. provides video analytic technology solutions in China. The company offers video traffic analytics systems to shopping malls, department stores, exhibition and scenic spots, brand chain stores, and others. The company was formerly known as Winner Information Technology Co., Inc. and changed its name to Winner Technology Co., Inc. in August 2018. Winner Technology Co., Inc. was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

300634.SZ.summary: Richinfo Technology Co., Ltd. provides industrial Internet solutions and technical services in China. It provides cloud platform construction and operation, big data analysis, network monitoring, and mobile application development services. The company also offers color messaging system, color messaging enterprise network disk, multimedia unified office platform, color messaging application performance management system, color communication automation test platform, color data management platform, color message precision marketing intelligent recommendation platform, multimedia integrated marketing resource management platform, color messaging mobile application portal, color media operations management platform, color data big data intelligent analysis platform, color message management platform, color messaging mobile application data insight system, color message mail delivery platform, and multimedia anti-spam security gateway. In addition, it provides industry solutions for operators, financial insurance, government business and organization, electric and energy, enterprise, educational institution, retail and logistics, and education and research industries. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen Richinfo Technology Limited and changed its name to Richinfo Technology Co., Ltd. in June 2016. Richinfo Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2004 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

300663.SZ.summary: Client Service International, Inc. develops and sells financial software products for high-tech companies in China. The company offers various software solutions for the banking industry; and consulting services. Its products and services include direct Internet banking; financial open platform; e-banking solutions; and online banking security solutions, as well as business series solutions. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Beijing, China.

300678.SZ.long_name: Chengdu Information Technology of The Chinese Academy of Sciences Co., Ltd.
300678.SZ.summary: Chengdu Information Technology of The Chinese Academy of Sciences Co., Ltd. provides intelligent engineering, and related products and technical services to government, tobacco, oil and gas, special printing, and other industries. It offers election equipment and service for party and national conferences; testing equipment for the national printing industry; and intelligent city key technology, platform system, and transportation solutions based on cloud computing, large data, Internet of Things, and mobile Internet for government. The company also provides various solutions for tobacco industry comprising tobacco planting expert analysis system; tobacco leaf digital storage and logistics integrated platform; data collection and intelligent diagnosis and analysis system in cigarette factory; life cycle tracking and management system for cigarette accessories; cigarette research and development information management system; and tobacco logistics park information infrastructure construction solutions. In addition, it offers inspection equipment for banknote printing industry, such as large bill quality inspection machines, banknote printed gravure online detection systems, paper machine online quality inspection systems, cutting quality on line detection systems, and banknote sorting machines; and oil and gas industry information construction solutions, including oil and gas field digital production management solution, as well as integrates electronic logging, automatic collection, real-time monitoring, intelligent defense, management, and scientific command solutions. Chengdu Information Technology of The Chinese Academy of Sciences Co., Ltd. was founded in 1958 and is based in Chengdu, China.

300682.SZ.summary: Longshine Technology Group Co., Ltd. provides software and IT services for the power industry in China and internationally. It provides inspection monitoring system of power marketing; billing and customer service system; call center operation management system; LongShine Zeus cloud platform; data visualization platform; data processing platform; IoT acquisition platform; smart city industry Internet open platform; and order merchandise and living payment platforms. It also provides China international trade single window platform, port operation-service and public service platforms, identification service for international trade; new energy vehicle, integrated energy service cloud, EV pile cloud, smart power cloud, government new energy, intelligent parking, smart street light, charging pile management, photovoltaic cloud, and IoT terminal solutions; HanClouds industrial Internet platform; intelligent customer service, self-help intelligence analysis, and relationship network analysis solutions. In addition, the company offers cloud services, such as consulting, planning, and cloud design and implementation services, as well as traditional data center hybrid cloud upgrade and construction services; and intelligent cloud based customer services. The company was formerly known as LongShine Technology Co., Ltd. Longshine Technology Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Wuxi, China.

300773.SZ.summary: Lakala Payment Corporation provides third-party payment and financial technology services in China. The company offers third-party payment, personal payment, merchant receipt, and related derivative services in the form of online/offline and hardware/software. It provides convenient payment, POS receipt, and cross-border payment services; and Internet finance and community e-commerce services to community residents. The company also offers receipt and convenient terminal, and payment bracelet products. It provides value-added services for various industries, such as catering, retail, insurance, education, tourism, etc. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Beijing, China.

300830.SZ.summary: JinXianDai Information Industry Co.,Ltd. develops software products in China. It offers data visualization, mobile application, testing, UED, artificial intelligence, and other software products. The company also provides information solutions and services for various industries, such as power, petrochemical, public security, railway, government, aerospace, communications, coal, and others. It distributes its products in 22 provinces, 5 autonomous regions, and 4 municipalities. JinXianDai Information Industry Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Jinan, China.

300895.SZ.long_name: Beijing Topnew Info & Tech Co., Ltd.
300895.SZ.summary: Beijing Topnew Info & Tech Co., Ltd. provides Internet data center services, Internet access services, and related value-added services. Its cloud services include Internet access, cloud computing, and cloud video conference services; IT services comprise configuration center and speed WAN services; and network Shield security management systems. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

307.F.summary: Shopify Inc., a commerce company, provides a cloud-based multi-channel commerce platform for small and medium-sized businesses in Canada, the United States, the United Kingdom, Australia, and internationally. Its platform provides merchants with a single view of business and customers in various sales channels, including Web and mobile storefronts, physical retail locations, social media storefronts, and marketplaces; and enables to manage products and inventory, process orders and payments, fulfill and ship orders, build customer relationships, source products, leverage analytics and reporting, and access financing. The company was formerly known as Jaded Pixel Technologies Inc. and changed its name to Shopify Inc. in November 2011. Shopify Inc. was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Ottawa, Canada.

30E.F.summary: Envestnet, Inc., together with its subsidiaries, provides intelligent systems for wealth management and financial wellness in the United States and internationally. It operates through Envestnet Welth Solutions and Envestnet Data & Analytics segments. The company's product and services include Envestnet | Enterprise, which provides an end-to-end open architecture wealth management platform, as well as sells data aggregation and reporting, data analytics, and digital advice capabilities; Envestnet | Tamarac that provides trading, rebalancing, portfolio accounting, performance reporting, and client relationship management software; and Envestnet | MoneyGuide that provides goals-based financial planning solutions to the financial services industry. It also provides Envestnet | Retirement Solutions, which offer a suite of services for advisor-sold retirement plans; and Envestnet | Portfolio Management Consultants that provide research and consulting services to assist advisors in creating investment solutions for their clients, and portfolio overlay and tax optimization services, as well as data aggregation and data analytics platform, which offers cloud-based innovation for digital financial services. The company primarily serves banks, wealth management and brokerage firms, internet services companies, and registered investment advisers. Envestnet, Inc. was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Chicago, Illinois.

3390.T.summary: INEST, Inc. provides smart solutions in Japan. The company sells mobile phones, smart phones, and tablet terminals. It is also involved in the development, sale, operation, and maintenance of Web services. In addition, the company operates as an ASP for stores, such as drinking chains. Further, it operates Otoku Keitai.net, a mobile/smartphone sales site; a retrieval and reservation site to takeout; a visit reservation site; a site for parking reservation in sport and event venues, and airports; and a portal site to search and make reservations for mobile shops, as well as sells specialized digital signage for real estate and ASP remote monitoring systems. The company was formerly known as Universal Solution Systems Inc. INEST, Inc. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

3653.T.summary: Morpho, Inc. engages in the research, development, and licensing of image processing technologies in Japan. It offers image and motion stabilization; AI inference software; video processing software package; artificial bokeh effect; flash reduction; noise reduction; HDR and DR-corrected image generation; panorama image generation; high-speed video generation; visual SLAM; and motion vector and face detection. The company also provides imaging effect filters library; rectangle object detection and extraction; image classification and super resolution; focus-adjustable image generation; frame interpolator; and posture estimation technologies. Its solutions are embedded in camera phones, digital cameras, and other mobile devices. Morpho, Inc. was founded in 2004 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

3663.T.summary: ArtSpark Holdings Inc. engages in the UI/UX and creator support businesses. It develops UI solutions to manufacturers of mobile devices and digital home appliances primarily in the automotive field. The company also provides illustration, comic, and animation creation software and web services, as well as e-book solutions. The company was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

3687.T.summary: Fixstars Corporation operates as a software company in Japan and internationally. The company offers M3 technical support, processor evaluation, software development and optimization, OS firmware development support, system configuration, training for software developers, and other services. It serves in the area of automotive, flash storage, industrial, finance, healthcare, and computing. Fixstars Corporation was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

3689.T.summary: IGNIS LTD. designs, develops, operates, and sells smartphone applications in Japan. It develops tool-based applications, free casual games, and native social games, as well as communication applications. The company was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

3692.T.summary: FFRI Security, Inc. provides cyber security products in Japan. The company engages in the research, consulting, information provision, and education of computer security and network systems. It is also involved in the planning, development, sale, leasing, maintenance, management, and operation of computer software and programs; and the acquisition, transfer, lending, and management of related property right, such as copyrights, patent rights, utility model rights, trademark rights, and design rights. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

3697.T.summary: SHIFT, Inc. provides software quality assurance and testing solutions in Japan. The company offers CAT, an integrated environment that supports the implementation of testing; CI (Jenkins), an outsourcing service for agile development, such as GUI automatic testing using Jenkins and Selenium Web Driver; test design solutions; non-functional testing solutions, such as load and security tests; and localization solutions. It also provides MinTest, a Website to report bugs of social games and applications. In addition, the company plans, manufactures, and sells electrical and electronics goods, software, and hardware, as well as manufactures, sells, and imports and exports related goods. SHIFT, Inc. offers its solutions in the areas of EPR/groupware, accounting, e-commerce, finance, medical/nursing, aerospace, manufacturing/retail, and real estate, as well as for smart phones and security servers. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

36N0.F.summary: Abaxx Technologies, Inc., a development stage financial technology company, develops software tools for commodity traders and finance professionals to communicate, trade, and transact. It provides trading and clearing software, financial messaging and data services, and digital identity and access management software. The company is based in Toronto, Canada.

36W.F.summary: Weimob Inc., an investment holding company, provides cloud-based commerce and marketing solutions in the People's Republic of China. The company operates in two segments, SaaS Products and Targeted Marketing Service. It offers software as a service products, such as commerce cloud products, which include Wei Mall, an integrated e-commerce solution; Smart Retail, a solution for offline retail merchants; Ke Lai Dian, a WeChat-based solution for merchants; Smart Restaurant that targets merchants in the restaurant and catering industry; Cloud Store, a vertical solution for the food delivery industry, featuring mobile ordering, online payment, receipt issuing, physical delivery, mobile social networking marketing, sales promotion, and customer membership management services; Smart Hotel for merchants in the hospitality industry; Smart Beauty, which provides a solution for the beauty industry merchants; Smart Meeting, a digital conference solution; and Smart Traveling, a solution for travel agencies. The company also provides Marketing Cloud, including Wei Station that enables enterprises and brands to establish their own official WeChat Mini Program-based website; Smart Marketing, a marketing platform for enterprises; and Wei Form, a general solution for merchants with various information collection, as well as Sales Pusher, an intelligent solution for enterprises to enhance the customer acquisition capability of their sales force. In addition, it offers Targeted Marketing, a platform for mobile advertising. The company was founded in 2013 and is headquartered in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China.

3710.T.summary: Jorudan Co.,Ltd. engages in the development of program products in Japan. It offers Japan Transit Planner, a service that helps to search routes, fares, and schedules of trains and airplanes in Japan. The company is also involved in the planning, designing, development, and maintenance of systems, software, and Fintech solutions; production of digital contents; provision of mobile and Internet contents; travel; advertisement; publishing; sales and maintenance of hardware; development and maintenance of software; and electronic commerce business. The company was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

3712.T.summary: Information Planning CO., LTD. provides system consulting services primarily for financial institutions. The company offers credit risk management related products, including comprehensive financial statement registration solution, collateral/ real estate management, self-assessment/ delinquency management, and risk weighing solutions. It also provides loan related products, such as loan approval support, contract create support, benchmark aggregation, business feasibility evaluation support, and public relations support map system; general affairs/ accounting related products comprising fixed asset management, settlement business support, anti-social forces information check, equity management, expense payment office work support, and securities management systems; and tax/ accounting related products, such as real-time connection and fixed asset management systems. In addition, the company engages in the real estate leasing and management activities; and provides development, planning, and system data input agency services. Information Planning CO., LTD. was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

3727.T.summary: Aplix Corporation engages in the technology business. It develops package software for the NeXT computer system; CD/DVD authoring software; automotive telematics systems; java for consumer electronics; and JBlend software on mobile phones. The company also develops and markets Internet of Things products from hardware and software to cloud service; and develops wireless communication technologies that connect consumer electronic products to mobile devices. In addition, it offers communication modules, Wi-Fi solutions, BLE/Wi-Fi gateways, and embedded water flow sensors. The company was formerly known as Aplix IP Holdings Corporation and changed its name to Aplix Corporation in April 2017. Aplix Corporation was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

3738.HK.summary: Vobile Group Limited, an investment holding company, provides software as a service in the United States, Japan, Mainland China, and internationally. The company offers online video content protection and monetization services for content owners to protect their content from unauthorized use, measure the viewership of their content, and monetize their content. It provides content protection, measurement, and management and monetization platforms, as well as pay per transaction platforms. The company serves film studios, TV networks, record labels, DTC service providers, subscription video-on-demand content aggregators, sports leagues, toys and games companies, and other content owners. Vobile Group Limited was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Santa Clara, California.

3744.T.summary: SIOS Corporation provides software solutions. Its products and services include business continuity solutions; open source solutions; SIOS applications; music licensing solutions; integration services; and machine-learning software solutions. The company was formerly known as SIOS Technology, Inc. and changed its name to SIOS Corporation in October 2017. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

3763.T.summary: Pro-Ship Incorporated engages in the development, sale, consulting, and customization of solution packages for asset management, sales management, and others in Japan. The company offers ProPlus Series, which include ProPlus fixed asset and sales management solutions. It is also involved in the design and development of tailor-made back-office and information systems; and management of business application and infrastructure systems for clients. The company was formerly known as Japan M.I.S. Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Pro-Ship Incorporated in May 2001. The company was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

3787.T.summary: Techno Mathematical Co., Ltd. develops software and hardware IPs in Japan. Its products includes LSI/board, audio, video, still image, voice, encryption, multimedia BC, windows media, noise suppression, super resolution, lossless/visually lossless, FPGA, original codec, high compression, frame rate converter, low latency, filter, and Gstreamer. The company develops and licenses image, audio, and voice related software IPs for various types of digital equipment; and hardware IPs used for design data for silicon chips. It also provides and licenses single function LSIs based on IPs and solutions for various multimedia applications. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

3796.T.summary: e-Seikatsu Co.,Ltd. operates as real estate technology company in Japan. It provides cloud-based real estate transaction support system centered on a database function for managing customer information, as well as offers marketing and sales activities. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

3800.T.summary: Unirita Inc. provides software and solutions for information technology (IT) systems operation in Japan and internationally. The company offers lifecycle management for IT services; A-AUTO, an advanced automatic job scheduling and monitoring system that automates application scheduling, execution, and control in multi-platform environments; and Sky-Eye Tribune, a monitoring system, which provides resource management, network management, server management, and desktop management services. It also provides TIA Report, a total information analysis report system that enables proactive system management and planning; BSP-RM, an integrated multiplatform report management system, which stores and distributes report data created in application programs; Exentry, a data entry system; and Be.Learning, an e-learning system that specializes in IT system operations management. In addition, the company offers A-SPOOL, an advanced report management system, which stores, separates, bundles, prints, and archives application reports; and A-LOG, a job log and system log management system. Further, it provides professional services and consultation in the management of IT systems operation; Sys-Doc., a service for diagnosing systems operation; and software products and support services. The company serves finance, manufacturing, pharmaceutics, and telecommunications industries, as well as data centers, outsourcers, and system integrators. Unirita Inc. was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

3823.T.summary: Acrodea, Inc. provides services and solutions for smartphones in Japan. The company offers platform services for smartphones and IoT related solutions; social game and application related development services; Technical Pitch to analyze pitching data; Kisekae touch, a home application to change the design of the home screen background, application icon, drawer, etc.; and intercom IoT systems. It also engages in real estate subleases, trademark rights management, and food businesses; conducting IT seminar business for job seekers and general users; and provision of corporate training services. Acrodea, Inc. was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

3835.T.summary: eBase Co., Ltd. engages in the planning, development, sale, and maintenance of content management software in Japan. It primarily offers eBASE, an enterprise information exchange platform for product information and various content management software within the company. The company provides various food industry solutions, including food supermarkets, food wholesale, processed food manufacturers, restaurant, claim information management, food labeling countermeasure, i-Tre cooperative, transaction document management, and food traceability solutions. It also offers daily miscellaneous goods industry, residential industry, data pool, printing industry, and sales support solutions, as well as middleware. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

3836.T.summary: Avant Corporation, through its subsidiaries, provides business intelligence, data integration, and system engineering services. The company also offers consolidated accounting and business management services; and business outsourcing services. In addition, it provides disclosure information search and financial analysis services; search engine for laws, accounting, and tax practice; and English disclosure document creation services. AVANT Corporation has strategic alliance with Metapraxis Ltd. The company was formerly known as Diva Corporation and changed its name to Avant Corporation in October 2013. Avant Corporation was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

3841.T.summary: Jedat Inc., a research and development oriented company, develops, sells, and distributes electronic design automation (EDA) software for designing semiconductor devices and chips (LSIs) and liquid crystal display panels worldwide. It offers Alpha-SX, an EDA software that is used in semiconductor design applications, as well as a range of applications, such as flat-panel displays, MEMS, lead frames, and semiconductor packages. The company also provides LSI, flat panel display, and fine pattern design solutions. In addition, it offers training services related to EDA software; development services for custom software, PDK for specific process, and specific Spice model; and analog LSI design consulting services, as well as design environment building and improvement support services. The company was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan. Jedat Inc. is a subsidiary of ARGO GRAPHICS Inc.

3853.T.summary: Asteria Corporation develops and sells software. Its products include ASTERIA Warp, a data integration middleware that supports automation of operations through non-programming technology; SnapCal, which provides seamless integration for Google calendar, tasks, and iOS calendar; and lino, a sticky and canvas service. The company also provides Handbook, a mobile content management platform for tablets and smartphones; and product support, consulting, and training services. Asteria Corporation was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

3856.T.summary: Abalance Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, engages in information technology (IT), construction machine sales, and solar power generation businesses in Japan. It offers KnowledgeMarket, an information sharing/knowledge management tool; Robowiser Framework, a tool that realizes automation of tasks; and Nintex Workflow related products, as well as provides outsourcing and consulting services. The company also offers photovoltaic power generation systems; develops, designs, manufactures, and sells Maxar, a solar module; and Eco Smart View, a solar monitoring system for green energy facilities. In addition, it engages in the sale, lease, and rental of new and used construction and equipment. The company was formerly known as REALCOM Inc. and changed its name to Abalance Corporation in March 2017. Abalance Corporation was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

3905.T.summary: Datasection Inc. provides solutions for social media analysis, retail marketing, and artificial intelligence development in Japan, Chile, and Colombia. Its solutions include product review survey; lifestyle analysis; brand image measurement; public opinion polls; Insight Intelligence Q, a tool that allows to search and analyze consumer voices on the web; and Social Monitor, a risk monitoring tool that constantly checks the consumer voices. The company also offers FollowUP, a tool that analyzes the behavior of the store visitors; and artificial intelligence solutions comprising data crawling, image processing, and social media data analysis. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

3909.T.summary: Showcase Inc. provides Website optimization services in Japan. The company offers NaviCast Form Assist, an entry form optimization (EFO) tool that measures to enhance the input rate in order to maximize the results; NaviCast Form Converter, mobile EFO that optimizes forms for smartphones; and Bitwave, an advertisement distribution service centered on SNS and videos. It also provides online authentication services, such as personal authentication, face authentication, license reading, etc.; ID Checker, a SaaS-type e-KYC tool that performs identity verification through a smartphone browser; and business automation support services, including RPA, industry-specific SaaS, video marketing support, etc. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

3910.T.summary: MKSystem Corporation provides system development and ASP services in Japan. It operates in two segments, Shalom Business and CuBe Business. The company provides DirectHR, a solution for corporate personnel and general affairs divisions. It is also involved in the contracted development of front-end systems for the personnel and general affairs divisions of large companies to enhance their business processes. In addition, the company offers GooooN cloud services. It serves social insurance labor consultant offices, social insurance labor consulting corporations, labor insurance office associations, SR management labor centers, and general companies. MKSystem Corporation was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

3913.T.summary: sMedio, Inc. provides software development and services worldwide. The company offers multimedia and wireless connectivity solutions. It offers sMedio Face Detector, a face recognition solution; sMedio Emotion Recognition, a facial expression recognition solution; sMedio Gender Recognition and sMedio Age Recognition solutions, which estimates gender and age from a detected face; sMedio Motion Recognition that detects moving people in a video, and recognizes their motions as standing, sitting, walking, running, or falling; and sMedio Object Tracker, objects detection and tracking solution in a video. The company also provides sMedio IoT Gateway Solution, a gateway software for IoT devices; sMedio IoT Edge Device SDK, a software development solution for IoT edge devices; JS Backup, a backup tool; JS backup viewer, a photo viewer application; RiskFinder, a Web service for vulnerability assessment on Android applications; tourbillon3, a HTML, BML, and IPTV based embedded browser; and Valution BD, a Blu-ray Disc playback software. In addition, it offers sMedio DTCP MOVE, an app for NAS system; sMedio True VR, a multimedia solution for virtual reality; sMedio True VR Sound, an engine to enable monaural sound to be 3D spatialize sound; sMedio pConnect for connecting the iOS/Android smartphone to PC; sMedio TV Suite for Android and Windows; sMedio TrueLink+ Hi-Res Edition, a multifunctional media player that enables Hi-res audio playback; and sMedio Remote Access Solutions for remote access servers and clients. sMedio, Inc. was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

3917.T.summary: iRidge, Inc. engages in the planning, development, and operation of Internet services in Japan. It develops O2O applications; offers promotion planning, communication design, and business development services; financial technology solutions, including MoneyEasy and BUS PAY; real estate technology/voice user interface solutions, such as digital signage for condominiums, offices, and commercial facilities, as well as NOID, a voice AI assistants solution. The company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

3921.T.summary: NEOJAPAN Inc. develops and sells packaged software to small and medium-sized enterprises, large companies, schools, hospitals, local governments, and public agencies primarily in Japan. The company offers desknet's NEO, a groupware software; AppSuite, a tool to create custom business applications; ChatLuck, a chat-based business communication tool; and desknet's DB, an online database system, which enables sharing of information. It also provides Denbun, a Web-based email system for corporate clients that manages, sends, and receives emails through a Web browser; desknet's DAX, a file transfer system; desknet's SSS, a Web-based sales management system, which enables to monitor progress in business negotiations, client info, and sales; desknet's CAMS, a Web-based customer relationship management system; and desknet's Blog, a blog system. It also provides multi-application integration and hosting services; and system integration services, such as e-business system, e-commerce Website, infrastructure and middleware, application service provider Website construction, and online information distribution services, as well as application system construction for business and information purposes. NEOJAPAN Inc. was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Yokohama, Japan.

3933.T.summary: CHIeru Co.,Ltd. produces ICT environments for teaching and learning in schools in Japan and internationally. Its services include software and system products, teaching and learning resources, and strategic consulting for school ICT environments in primary and higher education. The company offers CaLabo EX, a computer-assisted digital language lab solution; InterCLASS Cloud, a cloud-based classroom management system; CaLabo LX software to support teacher and student activities in PC labs, classrooms, and libraries; and CaLabo TX, a classroom management system for tablet PCs. It also provides S300-AV, a hardware-based screen and audio sharing system; and S300-HD, a digital video/sound transfer system. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

3937.T.summary: Ubicom Holdings, Inc. engages in the development of software in Japan. The company is involved in the application and system development; embedded software, firmware, and drivers development for printers, input/output devices, storage devices, and mobile devices; and software testing business. It also provides medical information systems, such as Mighty checker, a reception inspection software; Mighty Cube, an ordering check software; and Mighty Trace System, a cell culture process support support system, as well as offers data analysis, system development, and consulting services. In addition, the company is involved in the AI application development, proof of concept development, and corpus creation support business; and provision of data analysis, visualization, extraction, conversion, loading, and cleansing services. Further, it engages in the test automation support service; test process automation design, construction, installation support; development and provision of automation tools; and test result analysis business. The company was formerly known as AWS Holdings, Inc. and changed its name to Ubicom Holdings, Inc. in July 2017. Ubicom Holdings, Inc. was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

3967.T.summary: Eltes Co.,Ltd. provides database risk and storage protection consultation services in Japan. It offers social and internal risk management, online reputation management, digital credit, and security services. The company also support information banks, smart-cities, and e-Government with construction of infrastructures for secure information exchange and heavy transactions based on distributed databases and personal authentication systems. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

3969.T.summary: ATLED CORP. develops software solutions in Japan. Its products and services include Cybozu Office, a groupware for small and midsize enterprises; Cybozu Garoon, a groupware for midsize to large size enterprises; kintone, a PaaS structured as a business app; Cybozu KUNAI, a smartphone app; Cybozu MailWise, a mail sharing system; and Cybozu Remote Service, a relay service for external lines. The company also operates Cybozu Teamwork Research Institute that explores methods to improve teamwork, as well as provides seminars and training courses on these methods. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

4845.T.summary: Scala, Inc. engages in the SaaS/ASP, sales force automation, field marketing, and customer support businesses in Japan. It also provides CRM/SFA software; offers education and consulting services; and operates an e-commerce site for buying and selling battle game trading cards. In addition, the company offers licenses for sales support systems; and cloud services, customized development, sales consulting, sales skill training, and business process consulting services. The company was formerly known as Fusion Partners Co. and changed its name to Scala, Inc. in December 2016. Scala, Inc. was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

4A91.F.summary: AVEVA Group plc, through its subsidiaries, provides engineering and industrial software solutions in the Asia Pacific, Europe, the Middle East, Africa, and the Americas. The company offers engineering, procurement, and construction; asset performance; monitoring and control; planning and scheduling; and operation and optimization industrial software solutions. It also provides digital transformation solutions covering artificial intelligence, cloud, digital twin, edge, extended reality, and Industrial Internet of Things products; and customer support and training services. The company serves customers in the chemicals, food and beverage, consumer packaged goods, infrastructure, life sciences, marine, mining, oil and gas, power and utilities, pulp and paper, steel fabrication, and water and wastewater industries. AVEVA Group plc has strategic partnerships with DORIS Group and Schneider Electric to deliver digital twin technology for the upstream oil and gas markets. The company was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Cambridge, the United Kingdom. AVEVA Group plc is a subsidiary of Schneider Electric S.E.

4P0.F.summary: AppFolio, Inc. provides industry-specific cloud-based business software solutions, services, and data analytics for the real estate and legal markets. The company offers AppFolio Property Manager, a cloud-based software solution for the real estate market that provides property managers of various sizes and tools and services designed to streamline their property management businesses; and AppFolio Investment Management, a cloud-based software solution for real estate investment managers of various sizes tools and services designed to streamline their real estate investment management businesses. It also provides MyCase, a legal practice and case management solution that provides managing calendars, contacts and documents, time tracking, billing and collections, and communicating with clients and sharing sensitive and privileged materials. In addition, the company offers Value+ services, such as Website design, electronic payment, tenant screening, insurance, contact center, premium leads, tenant debt collections, and utility management services. AppFolio, Inc. was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Santa Barbara, California.

4Q3.F.summary: RPMGlobal Holdings Limited develops and provides mining software solutions in Australia, Asia, the Americas, Africa, and Europe. It provides software licensing, consulting, implementation, and support; and technical, advisory, and training services to the resources industry, as well as laboratory gas testing services. The company also offers various software and solutions, such as enterprise planning framework; ISA-95, an open standard communication protocol; RESERVER, a mine reserve model; XECUTE that enables planners to build an ultra-short term schedule for providing link between medium term planning and operational execution; XPAC Solution, a scheduling software for oil sands, open cut coal and phosphate mines, open pit diamond and metal mines, quarries, underground coal and metal mines, steep coal, and stratigraphic metals; XACT, a short-term mining operation solution. In addition, it provides HAULISM, a 3-D discrete event simulation software; SIMULATE, a discrete event simulation software for original equipment manufacturers (OEMs); TALPAC, a haulage and loading simulator; Underground Coal TALPAC, a planning and productivity modelling solution; and DRAGSIM, a dragline simulation software. Additionally, it provides XERAS Enterprise, a zero-based budgeting solution; XERAS, a financial modelling solution; Shift Manager, a mine engineering and shift management software; MINVU, a mining management software; and AMT, an asset maintenance software for contractors and OEMs, as well as AMT4SAP to SAP's work management solution. The company was formerly known as RungePincockMinarco Limited and changed its name to RPMGlobal Holdings Limited in March 2017. The company was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Brisbane, Australia.

4T51.F.summary: KABN Systems NA Holdings Corp., through its subsidiary, KABN Systems North America Inc, focuses on the verification, management, and monetization of digital identity. The company develops and operates KABN ID, a blockchain and biometric based patent-pending digital identity validation and verification platform allowing users to prove their identity to the online community; Liquid Avatar that allows users to create digital icons representing their online personas; KABN Card, a Visa approved prepaid card program allowing users to manage digital and fiat currencies and earn cashback and other loyalty incentives ; and KABN KASH, a cashback, loyalty, and engagement program. The company is based in Markham, Canada.

4W9.F.summary: Pexip Holding ASA, a technology company that delivers a video-first meeting platform. Its platform simplifies video communication across borders, businesses, and platforms, enabling everyone to be seen, heard, and included. The company offers self-hosted and as-a-service deployment options for enterprise video conferencing built on the Pexip Infinity technology; and provides interoperability, including Microsoft Teams, Skype for Business, Google Hangouts Gateway interop, video system device registration, and a world-class meeting and calling service. The company has operations in the Asia Pacific, Europe, the Middle East, Africa, and the Americas. Pexip Holding ASA was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Oslo, Norway.

4WR.F.summary: Facedrive Inc. operates as a ride-sharing company in Canada. It offers Facedrive, a ridesharing platform; and TraceSCAN, a COVID-19 contact tracing app. The company was incorporated in 2016 and is headquartered in Richmond Hill, Canada.

4ZD.F.summary: Penneo ApS, a software-as-a-service company, provides an eco-system of automation solutions that digitizes companies' workflows of signing and managing documents. It digitizes, automates, and secures digital document handling workflows. The company serves customers in various industries, such as property management, finance, real estate, HR, and legal. Penneo ApS was founded in 2014 and is headquartered in Copenhagen, Denmark.

50O.F.summary: Shape Robotics A/S, an educational technology company, develops robot systems for education purpose worldwide. It develops Fable, a robot system that offers educational robot kits for use in teaching programs, robotics, and innovations in middle and secondary schools, as well as in universities. The company serves schools, municipalities, libraries, high-schools, vocational schools, coding clubs, and other private and public education institutions. It sells its products directly, as well as through distributors and resellers. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in Farum, Denmark.

5CP.SI.summary: Silverlake Axis Ltd, an investment holding company, provides software solutions and services to the banking, insurance, retail, government, payment, and logistics industries. Its products include Silverlake Axis integrated banking solutions, Silverlake Axis integrated Islamic banking solutions, Silverlake Axis integrated provident fund systems, Silverlake Axis cards systems, Silverlake digital banking MÃBIUS open banking platforms, Silverlake Axis retail merchandising systems, Silverlake Axis enterprise payment platforms, Cyber Village converged Internet and mobile platforms, and Silverlake Symmetri retail banking solutions; IntelliSuite solutions; NowSuite solutions; and digital identity and security software solutions. The company also offers software project customization and implementation services to deliver end-to-end banking, payment, retail, digital identity, and security software solutions; software maintenance support and enhancement services; processing services for credit cards and other credit products on an outsourcing basis; and cloud computing software-as-a service platform for policy origination and claim processing for the insurance industry, as well as sells software and hardware products, including the resale of IBM hardware products and related system software. In addition, it engages in the commercialization of software-as-a-service solutions for the automotive industry; and provision of Internet and mobile, portal, customer loyalty, and e-commerce solutions and services. Silverlake Axis Ltd operates in South East Asia, North East Asia, South Asia, the Middle East, the Americas, Africa, and Europe. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Petaling Jaya, Malaysia. Silverlake Axis Ltd is a subsidiary of Intelligentsia Holding Ltd.

5H3.F.summary: Eleco Plc provides software and related services to the architectural, engineering, construction, and owner/operator industries in the United Kingdom, Scandinavia, Germany, rest of Europe, the United States, and internationally. The company offers project management software under the Powerproject brand; cost estimating software under the Bidcon brand; CAD/design software solutions under the Arcon Evo and o2c brands; Interiormarket, an industry-specific and modular marketing solution; engineering software solutions under the Staircon and Statcon brands, as well as under the Framing name; and information management solutions under the IconSystem brand and MarketingManager name. It also provides computerized maintenance management software under the ShireSystem name. The company was formerly known as Elecosoft plc and changed its name to Eleco Plc in July 2020. Eleco Plc was founded in 1895 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.

5IG.F.summary: Ideagen plc develops and sells information management software in the United Kingdom, rest of Europe, North America, the Middle East, and internationally. Its governance, risk, and compliance (GRC) solutions include Q-Pulse QMS, a quality management software; Q-Pulse PM, a product management software; Q-Pulse Law, an EHS legal compliance software; Q-Pulse WorkRite, a health and safety management system; Pentana Audit, an audit automation software; Pentana Disclose, a financial disclosure checklist software; Pentana Compliance, an accountability and competency compliance software; and Pentana Risk, a cloud-based performance and risk management software. The company's GRC solutions also comprise Coruson, an enterprise cloud-based safety management software; PleaseReview, a document review, co-authoring, and redaction software; and Ideagen Academy, a cloud-based E-learning solution. It serves aerospace and defense, accounting, finance and banking, construction, aviation, energy, food and drink, healthcare, life science, and manufacturing industries. The company was formerly known as Datum International Plc and changed its name to Ideagen plc in July 2011. Ideagen plc was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Ruddington, the United Kingdom.

5IJ.F.summary: Conferize A/S develops an online software solution for event and conference market. Its primary product is event management software, which enables event organizers to solve various digital tasks needed to host an event. The company serves event organizers and attendees. It operates in approximately 140 countries. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in Copenhagen, Denmark.

5JL.F.summary: Bambuser AB (publ) develops and provides solutions for live streaming in Sweden. The company provides technology, which enables live streaming from mobile phones and Webcams over the Internet. It offers live video shopping, a cloud-based software solution that enables brands and e-merchants to live, sell products, and communicate with their customers directly on their website; one-to-one live video shopping that enables personal meetings with customers to supplement their digital customer service from chat to video personal meetings through live streaming; and live stream SDK, a software developers kit, which enables the customer to create their own mobile live video experiences. Bambuser AB (publ) has strategic partnerships with AMF Fastigheter AB to offer live video shopping into physical stores, as well as link in-store salespeople to customers at home; and Fhits to offer shopstreaming to fast-growing e-commerce market. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden.

5LL.F.summary: XMReality AB (publ) develops and sells solutions for knowledge sharing through augmented reality (AR) in Sweden. The company offers XMReality Remote Guidance software, which runs on smartphones, tablets, pointpads, and helmets. It also sells smart glasses. The company has partnership with Iristick NV. XMReality AB (publ) was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in LinkÃ¶ping, Sweden.

5Q5.F.summary: Snowflake Inc. provides cloud-based data platform in the United States and internationally. The company's platform enables customers to consolidate data into a single source of truth to drive meaningful business insights, build data-driven applications, and share data. Its platform is used by various organizations of various sizes in a range of industries. The company was formerly known as Snowflake Computing, Inc. and changed its name to Snowflake Inc. in April 2019. Snowflake Inc. was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in San Mateo, California.

5RW.F.summary: RIWI Corp. operates as a trend-tracking and prediction technology firm in the United States, Canada, Europe, and internationally. Its patented cloud-based and machine-learning software solution provides global digital intelligence platform to clients seeking real-time citizen sentiment data. The company offers real-time applied analytics, forecasts, advance warnings, digital surveys, ad tests, trend-monitoring, predictive analytics, risk monitoring, and message testing services. RIWI Corporation was incorporated in 2009 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.

5S5.F.summary: OneSoft Solutions Inc., through its subsidiaries, provides software solutions to the oil and gas pipeline industry in Canada and the United States. It offers Cognitive Integrity Management, a software-as-a-service application that uses the Microsoft Azure Cloud Platform and services, which includes machine learning, predictive analytics, business intelligence reporting, and other data science components to assist pipeline companies to prevent pipeline failures. The company was formerly known as Serenic Corporation and changed its name to OneSoft Solutions Inc. in July 2014. OneSoft Solutions Inc. is headquartered in Edmonton, Canada.

5SO.F.summary: SponsorsOne Inc., an early stage technology company, develops and operates a cloud based social sponsorship platform in the United States and Canada. The company develops SponsorsCloud, a platform for connecting and facilitating one-to one engagement between corporations to users in social networks. It also operates SponsorCoin, a platform that integrates with social networks and enables the delivery of the smart, social media marketing campaigns, and facilates transactions through its e-commerce platform, which supports the exchange of goods and services between brands and users using its digital currency SponsorCoin; and SponsorCoin and cash, a currency used to compensate the users for interacting, engaging, and creating social media content around a brands campaign. In addition, the company provides sales and marketing on behalf of the brand to its network of national wholesalers and retailers and offers purchase order financing to assist the brand in fulfilling every order; and brand building/management services, as well as manages the influencer communities for each brand. The company is headquartered in Uxbridge, Canada.

5TW.F.summary: Litium AB (publ) operates cloud based e-commerce platform for retailers, e-tailers, and B2B businesses. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden.

5VS.F.summary: Vsblty Groupe Technologies Corp. operates as a security and retail software technology company. Its software modules include VisionCaptor, a digital signage content management system; DataCaptor, which provides real-time analytics and audience measurement system; and VSBLTY Vector, a software module that interfaces with a local or remote database to detect persons or objects of interest within a camera's field of view. The company also provides retail hardware solutions that can be integrated with the digital screen. It has collaboration agreements with Photon-X, LLC; UST Global Inc.; Digitalware Inc.; and Prevenitas Inc. Vsblty Groupe Technologies Corp. is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.

5ZC.F.summary: CROOZ, Inc. engages in the e-commerce, media and advertising, gaming, and investment and financial businesses. The company plans, develops, and operates SHOPLIST.com, a fashion mail order; and offers EC site system construction, operation contract, fulfillment, and other solutions. It also provides advertising agency and media services; plans, develops, and manages games for smartphones; and invests in private equity funds. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

600271.SS.summary: Aisino Corporation provides information security solutions in China and internationally. The company offers intelligent tax solutions; financial IC cards, and residential health cards; and V70 terminals. It also provides E-ID solutions; intelligent emergency, and warehouse and logistics solutions; national citizen voting fingerprint application solutions; public safety solutions; solutions for government offices; border crossing security monitoring systems; intelligent vehicle management systems; and intelligent asset management solutions. It offers its services to various fields, including finance, education, customs, public security, and urban services. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Beijing, China.

600410.SS.summary: Beijing Teamsun Technology Co.,Ltd. provides enterprise IT products and consulting services. The company offers cloud data center; big data platform; Internet of Things applications; and server services. It serves telecommunication, postal, finance, government, tourism, education, manufacture, energy, transportation, military, and other fields. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

600446.SS.summary: Shenzhen Kingdom Sci-Tech Co., Ltd provides Fintech services in China. It offers software solutions in the fields of securities, assets management, over-the-counter exchange, banking, intelligent finance, financial regulation and data application, intelligent supervision of financial IT systems, and smart city. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

600476.SS.summary: Hunan Copote Science Technology Co.,Ltd. provides integrated IT services in the postal industry. The company offers China post vehicle operation control platform, a philatelic platform; China post Internet SMS service platform; satellite positioning intelligent vehicle; smart parcel cabinets; smart mailboxes; financial security intelligent management systems; money transport vehicle monitoring systems; smart travel systems; intelligent mail logistics systems; and bubble counting machines. It also provides Bluetooth electronic scales; network advertising media publishing systems; portable ticket label printers; desktop thermal barcode label printers; electronic surface sheet printers; industrial barcode label printers; document ticket scanners; handheld smart terminals; postage machines; and envelope printers. The company is headquartered in Changsha, China.

600570.SS.summary: Hundsun Technologies Inc. provides financial software and network services in the People's Republic of China. It offers integrated solutions and services to the institutions of securities, futures, funds, trust, insurance, bank, exchange, and private placement. The company also provides wealth management tools to individual investors. Hundsun Technologies Inc. has a strategic partnership with Finastra Group Holdings Limited to develop and launch Fusion Invest, a new version of Finastra's portfolio management system. Hundsun Technologies Inc. was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, the People's Republic of China.

600588.SS.summary: Yonyou Network Technology Co., Ltd. provides software and cloud services for enterprises and public organizations. The company also offers financial services. It serves large, medium-sized, and small and micro enterprises. The company was formerly known as UFIDA Software Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Yonyou Network Technology Co., Ltd. in January 2015. Yonyou Network Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1988 and is based in Beijing, China.

600718.SS.summary: Neusoft Corporation provides information technology (IT) solutions and services worldwide. The company offers products and platforms, such as TalentBase human capital management system; SkillBase, an e-learning system; group financial management and control system; customer relationship management system; enterprise asset management system; super electronic archive system; business process content management platform; and UniOffice, an office management system. Its products and platforms also include picture archiving and communication software system; digital signage network/system; NetEye security operations center platform; NetPatrol, a network application monitoring and management system; Aclome, a cloud management environment; UniEAP, a unified enterprise application practice application; OpenBASE, a database management system; mobile device management system; navigation system; and rear view assistance system. In addition, it provides engineering services, such as application development and maintenance, ERP consulting and implementation, software globalization and localization, professional testing and performance engineering, and IT infrastructure services; on-demand services, such as Telemedicine, Xikang, and Telematics; and management consultation, business process outsourcing, and IT education and training services. Further, the company develops medical products, such as MRI, digital X-ray, color doppler ultrasound, laboratory automation, radiation therapy, and nuclear medicine imaging equipment, as well as CT scanners; and network security appliances. It serves telecom, energy, FSI, government, manufacturing, trade logistics, healthcare, education, transportation, automotive electronics, mobile terminals, digital home products, IT products, broadcasting and cinema, retail electronics, industrial control, and network security appliance sectors. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Shenyang, the People's Republic of China.

600756.SS.summary: Inspur Software Co., Ltd. engages in the development, production, and sale of computer hardware and software technologies in China and internationally. The company offers various servers, including rack servers, rack-scale systems, enterprise infrastructure, blade systems, mission critical systems, optimized application, SAP HANA systems, and server management platform. It also provides general purpose and software defined storage and solid-state array. In addition, the company offers AI solutions, such as management suite, hardware platform, application optimization, and end-to-end solution, as well as offers HPC products and solutions, including system platform and industrial appliances. Further, it provides enterprise cloud, public cloud, HPC, AI, SAP HANA, and HCI solutions, as well as industry solutions, such as e-government, e-education, smart city, e-taxation, media cloud, intelligent grain solution, public security solution, bank & enterprise cooperation solutions, and OSS assurance solution/IPMS. Additionally, the company offers software outsourcing service. The company's products are used by global data center, high performance computing center, tax, education, and government agencies. The company was formerly known as Shandong Inspur Software Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Inspur Software Co., Ltd. in January 2014. The company is headquartered in Jinan, China. Inspur Software Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Inspur Group Limited.

600845.SS.summary: Shanghai Baosight Software Co.,Ltd., a information and automation company, provides industrial solutions in China. The company offers information solutions, including manufacturing execution systems, advanced planning systems, quality management systems, equipment management systems, and logistics management systems; and automation solutions, such as automated solutions for whole metallurgical and automated solutions cold rolling processes, and data acquisition and analysis systems. It also provides process energy-saving solutions; electromechanical equipment comprising marking machines, full-hydrogen bell-type furnaces, and strip steel surface inspection systems; and intelligent manufacturing solutions that include cloud computing, Internet data center, big data, unmanned warehouse, industrial robot, Internet of Things, and car network solutions. The company operates through 12 branches. Shanghai Baosight Software Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

603039.SS.summary: Shanghai Weaver Network Co., Ltd. provides collaborative management software products in China. It offers e-cology, a platform for large and middle size enterprises; e-office, a collaboration platform for SMEs; eteams, a mobile cloud software; and e-mobile/mobile integration platform that enables mobile connectivity. The company serves manufacturing, real estate, software and Internet, financial, electronics, telecommunications, energy and chemical, automotive, media and entertainment, and catering chain industries, as well as textile, shoes, and apparel markets. Shanghai Weaver Network Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

603160.SS.summary: Shenzhen Goodix Technology Co., Ltd. operates as an integrated solution provider for applications based on IC design and software development offering software and hardware semiconductor solutions worldwide. It provides biometric authentication solutions for android devices, IoT applications, and automotive electronics. The company offers microcontrollers; Bluetooth low energy SoC chips; heart rate sensors; audio amplifiers; fingerprint sensors, including in-display fingerprint sensor, live finger detection, invisible fingerprint sensor, covered fingerprint sensor, and fingerprint sensor with hard coating solutions; and touchscreen and touchkey controllers, and mousepad solutions. Its products and solutions are used by various mobile brands, including Huawei, OPPO, vivo, Xiaomi, Samsung, Google, Amazon, Dell, HP, LG, OnePlus, Nokia, ASUS, etc. The company sells its products directly, as well as through agents and distributors to module makers, integrated solution providers, and device manufactures. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen Huiding Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shenzhen Goodix Technology Co., Ltd. in April 2017. Shenzhen Goodix Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

603528.SS.summary: DuoLun Technology Corporation Ltd. develops motor vehicle driver intelligent training, examination, and application systems in China. It offers smart driving test, wisdom driving, smart transportation, smart security, smart public security, and traffic safety solutions. The company was formerly known as Nanjing DuoLun Technology Corporation Ltd. and changed its name to DuoLun Technology Corporation Ltd. in October 2017. DuoLun Technology Corporation Ltd. was founded in 1995 and is based in Nanjing, China.

603533.SS.summary: IReader Technology Co., Ltd. provides palm reading software for Android and iOS platforms. It operates a mobile reading distribution platform comprising approximately 100 original works, as well as 600 domestic and international copyrights; and offers iReader, a smartbook. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in Beijing, China.

603636.SS.summary: Linewell Software Co., Ltd. engages in the software development and information technology service businesses in China. The company provides big data platforms, intelligent security solutions. It also offers smart government solutions, such as one window accepts cloud platform, power running cloud platform, power matter management system, handling information management system, online service hall, and trusted electronic license sharing service platform; wisdom public security solutions, including car big data platform, intelligent perception big data platform, and wireless terminal information application platform; and wisdom politics systems, such as wisdom political law solution, suit service, executive command center integrated application, and intelligent assistant case handling systems. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Quanzhou, China.

603776.SS.summary: Youon Technology Co.,Ltd provides green transport services through its Internet of Things technology and data platform. The company provides Wing of the line, a guide to the city green sharing travel service platform, which covers 220 cities, 32,000 shared bicycle service stations, and 800,000 shared bicycles. It also offers cloud service platform, site controller, lock car, public bike, and public bicycle car rental card services. The company was formerly known as Changzhou Youon Public Bicycle System Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Youon Technology Co.,Ltd in March 2018. Youon Technology Co.,Ltd is based in Changzhou, China.

603927.SS.summary: Sinosoft Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development of computer software. The company focuses on industry application software development covering application software, supporting software, system integration, and other application levels. It provides its solutions in the areas of property insurance, life insurance, health care, governments, financial sector, and call centers, as well as media, energy, postal, traffic, and civil aviation fields; and discipline inspection, enterprise information, and agent products. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Beijing, China.

6047.T.summary: Gunosy Inc. provides information curation services in Japan. It offers Internet services related to games and hints-and-tips, as well as advertising services. The company was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

6172.T.summary: Metaps Inc. engages in big data and artificial intelligence businesses worldwide. It offers payment solutions, such as credit card transactions on the Internet, payment using credit card terminals in real stores, convenience store payment, and electronic money payment. The company also provides various blockchain-focused services comprising cryptocurrency exchange and token generating event agency, etc.; users behavior analysis focusing on applications, metapse analytics that can analyze advertisement effect data in detail, and consulting services to support customers' products and promotion action measures; and marketing solutions centered on the utilization of data, as well as operate movie editing application service, such as Filmstory. In addition, it offers services that include distribution of online advertisements, data analysis, and optimization of sales promotion; support global deployment of application games; Timebank, an exchange that enables users to buy, use, sell, possess expert's time, as well as experts can change the spare time into earnings; and a money communication app pring that allows users to complete money transactions, such as send, receive, pay, charge, and return to account. Metaps Inc. was founded in 2007 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

63Q.F.summary: Tymlez Group Limited engages in the software development business in Australia, the Netherlands, Germany, and the United States. The company provides blockchain software solution platform that enables businesses to develop, deploy, and manage blockchain applications algorithms. It offers Tymlez Platform that develops various blockchain-based applications. The company was founded in 2016 and is headquartered in Amsterdam, the Netherlands. Tymlez Group Limited is a subsidiary of Tyhold 2 B.V.

6688.HK.summary: Ant Group Co., Ltd. operates digital payments and digital finance platforms in the People's Republic of China. The company operates Alipay, a digital payments platform; Yu'e Bao, an online spare cash management platform that puts user's money into a money market fund managed by a partner asset management company and generates returns for the user; and Huabei, a consumer credit platform that supports buy now and pay later for consumers. Its products and services also include Xiang Hu Bao, an online mutual aid platform that provides a basic health plan to protect participants against 100 kinds of critical illnesses; MYbank, an online private bank that serves small and micro businesses, as well as individual entrepreneurs; and Zhima Credit, a private and independent credit assessment service for commercial use. The company was formerly known as Ant Small and Micro Financial Services Group Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Ant Group Co., Ltd. in July 2020. Ant Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, The People's Republic of China.

6786.T.summary: RVH Inc. provides women care, media consulting, and system development services in Japan. The company operates beauty salons for hair removal; and esthetic salons and day-time hot bath facility, as well as Sakurabuchi Kawaguchiko hotel. It also plans, manufactures, and sells ladies fashion products. In addition, the company is involved in the digital business consulting, marketing consulting, Internet mail order businesses; Web marketing, Web site planning and production, social game production, cross media production, and system development activities; graphics business for various applications; and business application system construction, customer database system construction, temporary staffing business, PC data erasure, and recycling businesses. Further, it engages in the development and sale of cosmetics and beauty products; and e-commerce management, and media planning and development activities, as well as system development, software development, package development, hardware development, contract research, and consulting businesses. The company was formerly known as RealVision Inc. and changed its name to RVH Inc. in April 2015. RVH Inc. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

67I.F.summary: IGNIS LTD. designs, develops, operates, and sells smartphone applications in Japan. It develops tool-based applications, free casual games, and native social games, as well as communication applications. The company was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

688058.SS.summary: Beijing Baolande Software Corporation engages in the research and development, and sale of infrastructure software products in China, Nepal, Pakistan, and internationally. The company offers Web middleware, a HTTP protocol to support the EJB technology; application runtime platform software; application performance management technology, a real-time online monitoring technology; and service availability management platform, which provides proactive detection services for enterprise-class users. It also provides application server software, CORBA transaction middleware, message middleware, cloud management platform, APM, and distributed cache databases. In addition, the company offers BES application server, BES CloudLink, BES VBroker, BES WebGate, BES MQ, BES CacheDB, and other software products, as well as cloud computing technology. It serves telecommunication, financial, insurance, government, energy, and other industries. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in Beijing, China.

688066.SS.summary: Piesat Information Technology Co., Ltd. engages in research and application of satellite technology for remote sensing satellite and navigation satellite in China. The company offers pixel information expert (PIE), its flagship software for analyzing remote sensing image and data; and PIE-Map, a development platform that provides map navigation secondary development components, such as navigation cloud services and integrating solutions for the government, army, enterprises, and other clients. It also provides IT project consulting service to national satellite projects and other industries. The company was formerly known as Beijing PIESAT Information Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Piesat Information Technology Co., Ltd. in March 2020. Piesat Information Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2008 and is based in Beijing, China.

688095.SS.long_name: Fujian Foxit Software Development Joint Stock Co.,Ltd
688095.SS.summary: Fujian Foxit Software Development Joint Stock Co.,Ltd develops PDF electronic document solutions worldwide. The company offers various solutions covering the document life cycle, such as document generation, conversion, display, editing, search, printing, storage, signature, form, protection, and secure distribution management, as well as PDF software development kits and cloud solutions.
